About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm Full-Stack Software Engineer. I recently graduate from Prime Digital Academy with a Full-Stack Software Engineering certificate where I learned various technologies and how to utilize them by building full-stack applications in order to provide business solutions in today's economy. When I'm not devloping, I enjoy hiking outside and taking in the culture that surrounds the Twin Cities area.

Prime Digital Academy

Full-Stack Developer - Student

Attended and graduated with a Full-Stack certification. Prime is a 20 week immersion program where each cohort explores technologies in order to develope full-stack applications. The technologies used were: React.js, JavaScript, Git, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Material UI, Semantic UI, SQL, PostgreSQL, jQuery, Ajax, Axios, Node.js, and Express.js.

USG

Machine Operator

- I Collaborated and communicated with internal teams to build, grow, and maintain the customer experience.
- Analyzed and diagnosed machine malfunctions in compliance with production requirements while providing mentorship, training, and corrective action to a diverse team.
- Operated production machinery focused on timely and quality delivery of goods in adherence with organization standards and quality assurance.
- Improved efficiency of production using Kaizen methodology which led to $100K+ savings.
- Proactively identified appropriate solutions/changes in procedures for internal teams.
- Managed operational plans to track all product implementations, special projects, key dates, etc.

North Woods Credit Union Arena

Supervisor

- Maintained daily facility operations, including coordinating ice schedules, ice maintenance, and overall cleanliness of facilities.
- Spearheaded cost-saving initiatives across projects that allowed for employee improvement.
